title: Sports Pitches
content: The outdoor pitches make an excellent running or walking route.

title: Tennis and Basketball Courts
content: Grab your friends, book a court and take advantage of the outdoor courts.

title: Nursing and Health Sciences
content: Teaching rooms for Nursing and Health Sciences' students.

title: Sports Centre
content: Sport is a big part of life at Ulster and there is something to suit all levels and interests. Why not try a class with your friends or give the gym a go? The facilities offer affordable student rates.

title: Sports Hall
content: Sport is a big part of life at Ulster and there is something to suit all levels and interests. Why not try a class with your friends or give the gym a go? The facilities offer affordable student rates.

title: Main Reception
content: Visit the main reception to get your student card renewed or if you have a general enquiry about the Sports Village.

title: Firesert Building
content: The Fire Safety Engineering Research and Technology Centre (FireSERT) researches how fires develop, how structures respond to fires and how people react.

title: Firesert Building
content: Living in UU's student accommodation gives you exclusive access to activities, events and trips that help you to settle in and make new friends. Do you know that you have access to 24/7 support? Whatever you need, the team are ready to support you.

title: Changing Places/Toilets
content: Changing Places toilets are larger accessible toilets for severely disabled people, with equipment such as hoists, curtains, adult-sized changing benches and space for carers and can found at the Sports Village.

title: Food Outlet
content:
The Jordanstown Sports Village has two food outlets to get a coffee or lunch:
  • Sports Village Caf√© (near Sports Centre Entrance)
  • Day Today Shop (Dalriada Student Village)
There is a kitchenette on Level 2 of the Sports Centre.

title: Teaching Rooms
content: Teaching rooms are located in the main building.

title: Pay Point
content: You can pay for parking via card and cash at the dedicated pay point machines.

title: IT Labs
content: The lab is situated in the main building.

title: Sports Club Room
content: A dedicated space for members of UUSU's clubs.

title: Sports Hall
content: Sport is a big part of life at Ulster and there is something to suit all levels and interests. Why not try a class with your friends or give the gym a go? The facilities offer affordable student rates.

title: Transport
content: To plan your journey to the Sports Village via bus or rail.

title: Transport
content: To plan your journey to the Sports Village via bus or rail.

title: Parking
content: There is ample carparking available across the Sports Village.

title: Walking Trail
content: Get outdoors and enjoy the walking trail around the Sports Village.

title: No Vehicle Access
content: Each building/block is identified by a letter ie Student Wellbeing is situated in E block.

title: Digital Services
content: This is your go-to team for IT support both on-campus and from home. Our online 'Student Experience' page provides information on all our services including a 'Getting Started' area with guidance on the technology you need for online learning, how to access your email, the Student Portal, managing your password securely, and most importantly...how to get help!

title: Safe Zone
content: Peace of mind in your pocket - feel safe on campus 24/7 with our free app. By installing the SafeZone app and registering as a user, you will also receive any critical security notifications from the University. We encourage all students to download this app to stay up to date whilst on campus.

title: Student Card
content: Your student card is your key for gaining access to the Sports Village and unlocking some amazing student offers.

title: Hydration Stations
content: Don't forget to bring your water bottle with you - you'll find refill stations across the Sports Village.

title: Student Guide
content: Your online go-to for everything you need to know about life at UU.
